content.text: Hi there! What is your favorite thing about the summer?
I love going to the lake and swimming! What about you?
I love spending time with my family and friends. I also love reading! What do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially love mysteries and thrillers. Do you have any good book recommendations?
Yes, I recently read a great book called The Girl on the Train. It was a really suspenseful thriller. Have you heard of it?
No, I haven't! I'll have to check it out. Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome! What are you doing this summer?
I'm going to the lake a lot and I'm also going to visit some friends and family. What about you?
I'm going to the lake a few times and I'm also going to visit my family. I'm also going to be working a lot, but I'm hoping to find some time to relax and have fun too.
That sounds like a great summer! I hope you have a lot of fun.
